title: Custody Risk Magazine Names Citi Custodian of the Year in Latin America for the Second Year in a Row
summary: Miami, Fla. - Citi, the leading global bank, has been named Custodian of the Year in Latin America, for the second year in a row, by Custody Risk Magazine in its 2017 Custody Risk Awards. In addition, the bank won the Derivatives Clearing Provider of the Year and Transition Management Provider of the Year.
tag-1: Custody Risk Magazine Names Citi Custodian of the Year in Latin America for the Second Year in a Row
tag-2: Miami, Fla. – Citi, the leading global bank, has been named Custodian of the Year in Latin America, for the second year in a row, by Custody Risk Magazine in its 2017 Custody Risk Awards. In addition, the bank won the Derivatives Clearing Provider of the Year and Transition Management Provider of the Year.
tag-3: The awards—produced in association with Risk.net—celebrate outstanding achievements for custodians and fund administrators in Europe, Americas, and Asia as well as the best organizations globally among a number of categories. Winners were announced November 9 at an event in London.
tag-4: The final decisions were made by Risk's editors and journalists, weighing a number of factors, including risk management, creativity and innovation, liquidity provision, quality of service and customer satisfaction, and engagement with regulatory issues. Where decisions were tight, client feedback often helped settle the issue.
tag-5: "It is a great honor to receive this prestigious recognition again," said Ricardo Hesse, Citi Securities Services Head for Latin America. "This award reaffirms Citi's commitment to our clients and our ability deliver best in class custody services across the region."
tag-6: Citi has been a leading provider of custody services in the region for over two decades. Through its priority network in over 60 markets, Citi manages Direct Custody and Clearing Operations including asset servicing and transaction functions to Financial Institutions and Corporate Clients across the region.
tag-7: "As a custodian bank, Citi has been focusing on the continuous development both in people and infrastructure. We are always looking for ways to deliver the best custody experience and remain dedicated to offering quality products and services tailored to our clients' needs," said Hesse.
